title: Nadhiyile Song Lyrics Doo Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Silambarasan
Song: Nadhiyile
MOvie : Doo
Music : Abishek-Lawrence
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

Nadhiyile, Azhai Ondru, marubadi mithakuthe
Gnabahathil kadhavugal,adikkadi thirakuthe
CHinna chinnathaai, undhan ennam nulaindhu
Chitravadhayaai unnai kollukindrathe
Enna mandhiram iru kannil seikindraai
Idhayam undhan vali sellu kindrathe..

Oru paarvaiyaale, poothathu penne
Adi poothathu penne, en kadhal pookal
Vizhiyoram meendum, vandhathu penne
Adi vandhathu penne, naam pazhakiya naatkal

Kaadhal enbadhu enna privin valithaane
Penne penne pirivilthaane anbinai unnardhene
Dhinam dhinam unnai ninaika vaithaai
Manam athai meendum thulirka vaithaaiÂ 
Ganamindri ennai parakavaithaai
Vaana villil ennai nadaka vaithai

Oru paarvaiyaale, poothathu penne
Adi poothathu penne, en kadhal pookal
Vizhiyoram meendum, vandhathu penne
Adi vandhathu penne, naam pazhakiya naatkal

Pattampoochi meendum endhan viralil varukirathe
Pagalum Iravum innam puriyaatha mayakathai tharukirathe
Nizha oli athai rasika vaithaai
kaanakalil ennai vasika vaithaai
Nenjam engum vandhu innika vaithaai
Neram kaalam athai maraka vaithaai

Oru paarvaiyaale, poothathu penne
Adi poothathu penne, en kadhal pookal
Vizhiyoram meendum, vandhathu penne
Adi vandhathu penne, naam pazhakiya naatkal
